name: Gemma 3 12B (Instruct)
description: High-performance open-source Gemma model with excellent coding and reasoning capabilities. Multimodal with 128K context window.
notes: Open-source model with strong performance. Benchmarks: MMLU 71.9, HumanEval 85.4, GSM8K 94.4, MATH 83.8. Trained on 12T tokens. Uses SigLIP vision encoder. Available via Google AI Studio or self-hosted. 140+ language support. Requires ~8.7GB memory (4-bit).
